title: test_get_open_files() fails on Windows (github actions of datalad/git-annex testing)
body:
we had a similar fail before in #4192 but it was due to shortened paths, and was mitigated.
Now that I am adding forgotten `psutil` (and more) into that testing environment in https://github.com/datalad/git-annex/pull/75 we got it failing there as

```
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7670939Z ======================================================================
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7671889Z ERROR: datalad.tests.test_utils.test_get_open_files
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7673060Z ----------------------------------------------------------------------
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7673972Z Traceback (most recent call last):
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7677286Z   File "C:\hostedtoolcache\windows\Python\3.7.9\x64\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7678506Z     self.test(*self.arg)
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7679666Z   File "C:\hostedtoolcache\windows\Python\3.7.9\x64\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 585, in _wrap_with_tree
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7680752Z     return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7681929Z   File "C:\hostedtoolcache\windows\Python\3.7.9\x64\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\test_utils.py", line 1198, in test_get_open_files
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7683173Z     eq_(get_open_files(p, log_open=40)[str(f1.resolve())].pid,
2021-08-20T04:03:50.7684217Z KeyError: 'C:\\Users\\runneradmin\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\datalad_temp_tree_muae08r9\\1'
```

I think the first step would be to RF that test that it becomes possible to figure WTF is going on from the failure without debugging...
